page.title: 03 Old Forge Print
page.content: Old Forge Print is on the main A144 Bungay to Halesworth road. Mr. Luck bought the premises in 1979 when it was a craft shop called "Pot Luck". He changed the name to "Old Forge Pottery" and began to make small pieces of pottery i.e. cups and saucers,vases, pots etc. These were mostly orders for small firms around the area. Recently this year Mr. Luck has decided to change from pottery to printing and therefore, Old Forge Print was formed in June 1985.He has various printing machinery, some old and some newer models and is hoping to start with small printing jobs i.e. letter headings, cards etc.
